    • Method Detail

      • authenticate

        public java.lang.String authenticate(java.lang.String username,
                                     java.lang.String inputPw)
        authenticate

        public String authenticate(String username, String inputPw)

        Compare the username with the user name in data base and compare the corresponding password to the InputPw.

        Parameters:
        username - - The user name to compare with the one in data base.
        inputPw - - The password to compare with the one corresponding to the user name in data base.
        Returns:
        User Id if both parameters match the data in database, error otherwise.

      • checkPassword

        public boolean checkPassword(java.lang.String inputPassword,
                             java.lang.String realPassword)
        checkPassword

        public boolean checkPassword(String inputPassword, String realPassword)

        Compare realPassword with inputPassword.

        Parameters:
        inputPassword - - The password to compare with the real password
        realPassword - - The real password.
        Returns:
        true if the parameters match, false otherwise.

      • getSubordinates

        public javax.json.JsonArray getSubordinates(java.lang.Long userId)
        getSubordinates

        public JsonArray getSubordinates(Long userId)

        Build a JsonArray of subordinate users for a user.

        Parameters:
        userId - - The user's id
        Returns:
        A JsonArray of subordinate users, with ids and names.

      • getRole

        public java.lang.String getRole(java.lang.Long userId)
        getRole

        public String getRole(Long userId)

        Get a role of a user.

        Parameters:
        userId - - The user's id.
        Returns:
        The role in String format.
